sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Adds Recalled choice item for time_sheet_exception</description>
        <name>Add Recalled for time_sheet_exception</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var recalledChoiceItemSysId;
var recalledGr = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
recalledGr.addQuery('name', 'time_sheet_exception');
recalledGr.addQuery('element', 'state');
recalledGr.addQuery('language', 'en');
recalledGr.addQuery('value', 'Recalled');
recalledGr.query();

if (recalledGr.next()) {
    gs.log("'Recalled' choice item for state field in time_sheet_exception already exists");
} else {
    var recalledNewGR = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
    recalledNewGR.setValue('name', 'time_sheet_exception');
    recalledNewGR.setValue('element', 'state');
    recalledNewGR.setValue('language', 'en');
    recalledNewGR.setValue('label', 'Recalled');
    recalledNewGR.setValue('sequence', '7');
    recalledNewGR.setValue('value', 'Recalled');
    recalledChoiceItemSysId = recalledNewGR.insert();
    if (gs.nil(recalledChoiceItemSysId)) {
        gs.error("Failed to create 'Recalled' choice item for state field in time_sheet_exception table");
    } else {
        gs.log("Successfully created 'Recalled' choice item for state field in time_sheet_exception table");
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-11 22:27:02</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2647bb61a3b2011021de2c3346fcda4c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Add Recalled for time_sheet_exception</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Project Portfolio Suite" source="com.snc.project_portfolio_suite">1aef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_2647bb61a3b2011021de2c3346fcda4c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 09:27:25</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
